ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: it s been reset for us too (after that time i mentioned in fact).  i don t know if it s a bug or by design, but i guess a new guardian spawns for every
ygData.messageBody:
it's been reset for us too (after that time i mentioned in fact). i don't
know if it's a bug or by design, but i guess a new guardian spawns for every
seahorse you kill. i would guess a bug, phin is not supposed to be quite so
hard.

Shada


> Really? They reset it for you? One of my guild leaders, who
> has spent a
> great deal of time studying Kedge, figured out that there are
> specific MOBs
> who, if killed, cause an additional guardian to spawn.
> Seeing a dozen isn't
> at all unusual if you wait too long after a server reset. If
> they'll reset
> that, it's an interesting thing to know. Right now, we just
> don't bother with
> Phinny if it's been more than a few days since the last reset.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 47.6 songs, Innoruuk
